text:
Warren Berlinger (August 31, 1937 – December 2, 2020) was an American actor. He was born in New York City. His career lasted from 1946 to 2016. He was best known for his roles in "The Joey Bishop Show", "The Cannonball Run" and in "The World According to Garp".
Berlinger died on December 2, 2020 at a hospital in Santa Clarita, California at the age of 83.
